instruction.value: Rub dose gently into affected area. 2 g dose provided by a 4 cm strip of emulgel
Rub dose gently into affected area. 2 g dose provided by a 6 cm strip of emulgel
Rub dose gently into affected area. 2 g dose provided by a 8 cm strip of emulgel
Using the dosing card, squeeze the tube to provide the gel up to the 2 g measurement line. Apply the measured dose over the affected area.

ahfsname.value: Skin and Mucous Membrane Agents, Miscellaneous
